content: an easy beginner crochet blanket designed for red heart granny square all in one yarn go with the flow of color changes- no cutting or controlling colors needed just relax double_crochet and let the stripes create their magic a beautiful valley down the center of the blanket you can almost see a river running through it use 3 skeins of yarn for a small throw or child s blanket or 4 skeins of yarn for an adult-sized throw the sample blanket used 3 skeins of red heart granny square all in one yarn in the soft white - frigid colorway 100% acrylic 417 yards 381 m per 250-gram skein hook 6 5 mm skill level beginner/easy stitches chain and double_crochet in us terms the chain stitch is only needed for the starting row the rest of the blanket is double_crochet stitches introduction video https //youtu be/9lccbjs5jy8 si=lnaoz1dav6r7oypo share your blanket with #dreamvalleyblanket on instagram please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern and give design credit as dream valley blanket crochet pattern by pretty peaceful not for commercial use please do not share photos of this pattern only share the link to the pattern pdf on ravelry or etsy thank you for your support
